parameters.name: BindingType
parameters.description:
The type of the object that you want to unbind from the source exchange. Valid values:

*   **QUEUE**
*   **EXCHANGE**

parameters.name: DestinationName
parameters.description: The name of the object that you want to unbind from the source exchange.

parameters.name: SourceExchange
parameters.description: The name of the source exchange.
